participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Curious and talkative, enjoys sharing personal experiences.
participant_1.background: i walk three miles every day. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love to spend time with my family. i am a baby delivery nurse.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and nostalgic, appreciates music and creativity.
participant_2.background: i take dance lessons once a week. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop. my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite.
